name: Aqua Bubble (itch)
description:
Controls: Left Mouse to Shoot and Thrust, A and D keys to rotate, Spacebar to drop diamonds.

Created for the Playmaker Game Jam 2020 in less than 72 hrs such a great learning experience and an even greater playmaker community. Created with the Unity Game engine using 100% playmaker.

All art work created by me LumenRabbit as a solo developer (or at least I hope to be a developer soon).

Fits with the game jam theme From Below as these diamond miners are underwater, if the tangle with other miners they could be bubbled up to the surface. The second part of the game jam theme Separate but Equal as these guys are bubbled to the top they spend an equal amount of time in their respective bubble but are seperate.

I have learned a ton from doing this game jam! It was insanely tough I didn't get nowhere near as complete as I wanted but it sure is satisfying to have gotten this far.
